snippet.title: Why do cats purr
snippet.description:
Why do cats purr
Toegevoegd door smoothpeterson laatste november
All baby cats which we call kittens are borne with blue eyes. Eyes change the color after passage of time as the cat grows. It is at the number one slot in the pet list. Dog follows the cats, the reason for this is that cats are easier to handle, easier to trained and are more germs free than dogs. The major facts about cats which most of the pet owners tell are that cats are less risky for their families in comparison to dogs. To know more visit us @ http://www.whydocatspurrsoloud.com/
12 views

snippet.title: Do Big Cats Purr?
snippet.description:
Do Big Cats Purr?
Toegevoegd door Big Cat Rescue 2 jaren geleden
Do tigers, lions, leopards and other species of big cats purr like domestic cats? We're often asked this question so check out the video for answers.....WEBSITE: http://www.bigcatrescue.orgFACEBOOK: http://www.facebook.com/bigcatrescueGOOGLE+: https://plus.google.com/115333849859181638977/postsTWITTER: http://twitter.com/BigCatRescueDONATE: http://www.bigcatrescue.org/donate.htmBIG CAT SHOP: http://www.bigcatrescue.biz/servlet/StoreFrontTHANK YOU!

Learn how a Himalyan cat differs from a Tonkinese and what is unique about a Russian Blue cat. Do Exotic cats really live up to their name? I went to the Crow Canyon Cat Show to get some answers and I have the video to show you as well. I even found the crazy cat lady there... imagine that!

snippet.title: Why do cats bite
snippet.description:
Why do cats bite
Toegevoegd door smoothpeterson laatste december
If you have cats and you are puzzled by their behavior, especially when they bite, give a nip or lick you then you are advised to read this article carefully. This is very common behavior among all the cats and this is a sign of affection not the sign of aggression at all. They actually do this to show that they love you and it is their way of giving kisses. To know more visit us @ http://www.whydocatsbite.com/
36 views

snippet.title: Christina Applegate Purrs At 'Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore' LA Premiere

Christina Applegate Purrs At 'Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore' LA Premiere
Toegevoegd door Celeb News 3 jaren geleden
Hollyscoop caught up with Christina Applegate and other Stars at the LA Premiere of Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore. They tell us if they are a Cat or a Dog Lover, and why we should see this movie. Interviews by Matthew Hoffman.

snippet.title: Another purr-fect holiday with Jingle Cats
snippet.description:
Another purr-fect holiday with Jingle Cats
Toegevoegd door reuters laatste december
It wouldn't be a holiday season without a new project from the Jingle Cats: the kittens, who first meowed their way onto the music scene in 1993, are now on Blu-ray. The cats have become a bit of an international phenomenon. Their songs have been featured in several major films and have reportedly sold more than two million albums worldwide. Now, holiday kitty lovers can enjoy the singing sensations in HD quality. In addition to their improved look, the cats have remastered their holiday tales - making their version of "Silent Night" truly purr-fect.
144 views

Cat Purring Dog - Dog Purrs Like A Cat Cats purr, but not dogs, well not normally. Here the dog is purring as if it's a cat. Cat Purring Dog - Dog Purrs Like A Cat
